verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> He cried בְאָזְנַ֗י <S%H241><s%> also in mine ears ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> with a loud לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying קָרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> to draw near פְּקֻדּ֣וֹת <S%H6486><s%> Cause them that have charge הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> over the city וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> even every man כְּלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> weapon מַשְׁחֵת֖וֹ <S%H4892><s%> [with] his destroying בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> And behold six אֲנָשִׁ֡ים <S%H376><s%> and every man בָּאִ֣ים ׀ <S%H935><s%> came מִדֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> from the way שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הָעֶלְי֜וֹן <S%H5945><s%> of the higher אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> which מָפְנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> which lieth צָפ֗וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man כְּלִ֤י <S%H3627><s%> weapon מַפָּצוֹ֙ <S%H4660><s%> a slaughter בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְאִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> and one בְּתוֹכָם֙ <S%H8432><s%> among לָבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> them [was] clothed בַּדִּ֔ים <S%H906><s%> with linen וְקֶ֥סֶת <S%H7083><s%> inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> with a writer's בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> by his side וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they went in וַיַּ֣עַמְד֔וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> beside מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> the brasen

וּכְב֣וֹד ׀ <S%H3519><s%> And the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נַעֲלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> was gone up מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַכְּרוּב֙ <S%H3742><s%> from the cherub אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> had been עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> to מִפְתַּ֣ן <S%H4670><s%> whereupon he was to the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> And he called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> to the man הַלָּבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <S%H906><s%> with linen אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> whose קֶ֥סֶת <S%H7083><s%> inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> which [had] the writer's בְּמָתְנָֽיו׃ <S%H4975><s%> by his side ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God [אֵלֹו כ] (אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about ק) עֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> unto him Go through בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> the midst הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> through the midst יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְהִתְוִ֨יתָ <S%H8427><s%> and set תָּ֜ו <S%H8420><s%> a mark עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מִצְח֣וֹת <S%H4696><s%> upon the foreheads הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> of the men הַנֶּֽאֱנָחִים֙ <S%H584><s%> that sigh וְהַנֶּ֣אֱנָקִ֔ים <S%H602><s%> and that cry עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתּ֣וֹעֵב֔וֹת <S%H8441><s%> for all the abominations הַֽנַּעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that be done בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst

וּלְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> And to the others אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> he said בְּאָזְנַ֔י <S%H241><s%> in mine hearing עִבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> Go בָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> him through the city אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> ye after וְהַכּ֑וּ <S%H5221><s%> and smite [עַל־ כ] (אַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and תָּחֹ֥ס <S%H408><s%> nay ק) [עֵינֵיכֶם כ] (עֵינְכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> affliction ק) וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <S%H2550><s%> neither have ye pity

זָקֵ֡ן <S%H2205><s%> old בָּח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> [and] young וּבְתוּלָה֩ <S%H1330><s%> both maids וְטַ֨ף <S%H2945><s%> and little children וְנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> and women תַּהַרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> Slay לְמַשְׁחִ֗ית <S%H4889><s%> utterly וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַתָּו֙ <S%H8420><s%> upon whom [is] the mark אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּגַּ֔שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> but come not near וּמִמִּקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> at my sanctuary תָּחֵ֑לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> and begin וַיָּחֵ֙לּוּ֙ <S%H2490><s%> Then they began בָּאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> man הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> at the ancient אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> which [were] before הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to טַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> unto them Defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house וּמַלְא֧וּ <S%H4390><s%> and fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲצֵר֛וֹת <S%H2691><s%> the courts חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> with the slain צֵ֑אוּ <S%H3318><s%> go ye forth וְיָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> And they went forth וְהִכּ֥וּ <S%H5221><s%> and slew בָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> in the city

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּהַכּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H5221><s%> And it came to pass while they were slaying וְנֵֽאשֲׁאַ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> them and I was left אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וָאֶפְּלָ֨ה <S%H5307><s%> that I fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֗ק <S%H2199><s%> and cried וָֽאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הֲמַשְׁחִ֣ית <S%H7843><s%> wilt thou destroy אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> all the residue יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּשָׁפְכְּךָ֥ <S%H8210><s%> in thy pouring out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H2534><s%> of thy fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me עֲוֹ֨ן <S%H5771><s%> he unto me The iniquity בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> great בִּמְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> is very מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very וַתִּמָּלֵ֤א <S%H4390><s%> is full הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the land דָּמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> of blood וְהָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> full מֻטֶּ֑ה <S%H4297><s%> of perverseness כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> for they say עָזַ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> hath forsaken יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD רֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> seeth

וְגַ֨ם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אֲנִ֔י <S%H589><s%> I לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> And as for me also mine eye וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <S%H2550><s%> neither will I have pity דַּרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֥ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their head נָתָֽתִּי׃ <S%H5414><s%> [but] I will recompense

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> And behold the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3830><s%> apparel הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H906><s%> with linen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whose הַקֶּ֙סֶת֙ <S%H7083><s%> which [had] the inkhorn בְּמָתְנָ֔יו <S%H4975><s%> by his side מֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> reported דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> the matter לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying עָשִׂ֕יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have done [כַאֲשֶׁר כ] (כְּכֹ֖ל ק) (אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose ק) צִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> as thou hast commanded ס
